results.title: Ghana: ways forward
results.brief_description: Considers that progress in the form pf automation may have come too early for a country like Ghana. Now many of the population are idle. Looks at government instigated self-help programmes, which utilise the country’s biggest resource - people and aid in productivity.
results.description: Considers that progress in the form pf automation may have come too early for a country like Ghana. Now many of the population are idle. Looks at government instigated self-help programmes, which utilise the country’s biggest resource - people and aid in productivity.

results.title: Ghana: using what's around you
results.brief_description: This film shows how people living in a remote areas make do with a narrow range of foods and raw materials obtained from their immediate surroundings and how the rural technique of skilful improvisation with minimal tools and materials has been transferred to market towns.

results.title: Ghana: primary products
results.brief_description: Shows how a developing country’s economic livelihood depend on the production and export of a narrow range of raw materials. Practically all of Ghana’s export earnings come from a short list of primary products, headed by cocoa, and timber. Concludes with the important point that the slightest shift in world cocoa or timber prices can send shock waves through the whole economy.

results.title: Geysers, lava & hot spots
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Natural Phenomena Series”.
Uses the existence of geysers and lava flows as evidence of the heat inside the earth. Investigates the ways in which these hot spots were created and how they are different as well as looking how their energy can be harnessed by humans. Also provides a simple explanation of the formation of the earth.

results.title: Getting wet
results.creator_credit: P.J. Hogan, Chris Fitchett and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Fifteen year old Alex and his older brother, Michael both like the same girl who has worked in their family pub for years. When she accompanies the family on a holiday to the beach, Alex hopes he can attract her attention, but as usual it is Michael who gets the girl, but there are compensations for Alex.

results.title: Getting to know me
results.creator_credit: Ted Robinson, Eve Ash and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description: Leon Hustle, Sales Manager, is confronted by his mirror image Noel, after a disastrous start to a sales presentation. He learns to avoid stress and successfully manage his time by assessing commitments, setting realistic goals, establishing priorities, an action plan and allocating sufficient time to complete tasks effectively.
